metadata.Title: CVE-2020-27560 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - negligible
metadata.Description:
ImageMagick 7.0.10-34 allows Division by Zero in OptimizeLayerFrames inMagickCore/layer.c, which may cause a denial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-27560` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

imagemagick - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu11.2
imagemagick-6-common - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu11.2
imagemagick-6.q16 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu11.2
imagemagick-6.q16hdri - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu11.2
imagemagick-common - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu11.2
libimage-magick-perl - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu11.2
libimage-magick-q16-perl - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu11.2
libimage-magick-q16hdri-perl - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu11.2
libmagick++-6-headers - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu11.2
libmagick++-6.q16-8 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu11.2
libmagick++-6.q16hdri-8 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu11.2
libmagickcore-6-arch-config - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu11.2
libmagickcore-6-headers - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu11.2
libmagickcore-6.q16-6 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu11.2
libmagickcore-6.q16-6-extra - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu11.2
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-6 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu11.2
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-6-extra - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu11.2
libmagickwand-6-headers - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu11.2
libmagickwand-6.q16-6 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu11.2
libmagickwand-6.q16hdri-6 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu11.2
perlmagick - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu11.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in esm-apps/focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu11.2').
